blocks.name: 1neg1t1neg1
blocks.content: An integer unit times itself. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1neg1t1neg1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c0), nat1))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c0), nat1), wo(wceq(c0, cneg(nat1)), wceq(c0, nat1)))
  elpri(c0, cneg(nat1), nat1)
  jaoi(wceq(c0, cneg(nat1)), wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c0), nat1))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cmul, c0), nat1, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), wceq(c0, cneg(nat1)))
  oveq12d(c0, cmul, c0, cneg(nat1), cneg(nat1), wceq(c0, cneg(nat1)))
  id(wceq(c0, cneg(nat1)))
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  syl6eq(co(c0, cmul, c0), nat1, co(nat1, cmul, nat1), wceq(c0, nat1))
  oveq12d(c0, cmul, c0, nat1, nat1, wceq(c0, nat1))
  id(wceq(c0, nat1))
  1t1e1()
}

blocks.name: nnmulge
blocks.content: Multiplying by a positive integer ` M ` yields greater than or equal nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnmulge(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(c1, cle, co(c0, cmul, c1), co(nat1, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  mulid2d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nn0cnd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  lemul1ad(nat1, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  nn0red(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nn0ge0d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(nat1, cle, c0))
  nnge1(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnmulge(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→ c1[≤](c0[×]c1))
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(c1, cle, (c0[×]c1), (1[×]c1), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  mulid2d(c1, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  nn0cnd(c1, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  lemul1ad(nat1, c1, c0, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  1red((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  nnre(c0)
  nn0red(c1, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  nn0ge0d(c1, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, 1[≤]c0)
  nnge1(c0)
}
